# Class SafetyChecker

Implementation of content safety checking functionality.

Uses native bindings to perform safety checks on text content.

##### Index

### Methods

checkSafety destroy

## Methods

### checkSafety

  * checkSafety(  
input: [CheckSafetyInputInterface](/interfaces/primitives_safety_types.CheckSafetyInputInterface),  
config?: [SafetyConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_safety_types.SafetyConfigInterface),  
): Promise<[CheckSafetyResponseInterface](/interfaces/primitives_safety_types.CheckSafetyResponseInterface)>

Checks the safety of input text content.

#### Parameters

    * input: [CheckSafetyInputInterface](/interfaces/primitives_safety_types.CheckSafetyInputInterface)

Text content to check

    * `Optional`config: [SafetyConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_safety_types.SafetyConfigInterface)

Optional runtime safety configuration

#### Returns Promise<[CheckSafetyResponseInterface](/interfaces/primitives_safety_types.CheckSafetyResponseInterface)>

Promise resolving to safety check results

#### Throws

InworldError If check fails or input is invalid




### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources used by the safety checker.

#### Returns void
